titleStmt.title: Religion and language, as they are now in use through the chief regions of the world, both most briefly, and as faithfully discovered. / By a Person of quality.
titleStmt.author: Person of quality.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Samuel Speed; and are to be sold at the signe of the Rainbow neer the Inner Temple-gate in Fleet-street.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Christ Church (University of Oxford) Library.
